headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: https://img.youtube.com https://i.ytimg.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; frame-src https://open.spotify.com; connect-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self';
